TEXT.TITLE: HONG KONG BANKS LEAVE INTEREST RATES UNCHANGED
TEXT.BODY: The Hong Kong Association of Banks said it decided to leave interest rates unchanged at today's regular weekly meeting. Current rates are savings accounts and 24-hours two pct, seven-day call, one and two-weeks 2-1/4 pct, one and two months 2-3/4 pct, three and six months 3-1/4 pct, nine months 3-1/2 pct and 12 months four pct. Prime rate is 6-1/2 pct. REUTER
